about_the_game:
Pocket Legend follows the story of Blitz, a protagonist who is transported to another world where legendary weapons infused with souls exist. By strategically arranging various legendary items with unique abilities in the inventory, players must defeat enemies with diverse attack patterns that hinder their progress. This “inventory” roguelike deck-building game weaves its story as you master each challenge and unlock the secrets of a world where every item holds a legend of its own.

Gameplay

In this "inventory" roguelike deck-building game, each card's ability is influenced by its position in the inventory, the surrounding situation, and relics.

For example:

  • The more empty spaces around a card, the stronger its attack against enemies.

  • The more obstructive blocks in the inventory, the more powerful the attack becomes.

  • The better you organize, the stronger you become.

Unlike games where you set up and observe, Pocket Legend challenges you to reorganize your inventory every turn, pushing you to find the optimal setup for each battle. This dynamic system makes every turn fresh, engaging, and strategic.

5 Main Card Types

  • Weapon Deal damage to enemies.

  • Armor Increase the player's defense.

  • Skill Trigger various effects that can immediately impact the battle.

  • Binding Provide continuous effects just by being placed in the inventory.

  • Obstruction Mostly created by enemies to disrupt your gameplay.

The game’s core thrill lies in combining these five card types for maximum synergy. With each victory, you earn inventory fragments to expand your space and collect new cards, adding layers of strategy as you progress.

Inventory as a Cost

In Pocket Legend, you can freely arrange tools within your inventory. The inventory itself acts as the cost system.

World Concept

The player is transported to the world of "Lumensia" and gains the power of the "Inventory." This leads them to become entangled in major events.

Pocket Legend features a wide array of legendary weapons, including Gram, Fridwen, Gae Bolg, Arondight, Levatein, Tyrfing, and Failnaught. These captivating legendary tools are imbued with souls, allowing them to bond with the player and join them on an adventure.

Can Blitz conquer the formidable foes known as the 'Tanebra' and find a way back to their own world? Dive into Pocket Legend to discover the fate that awaits!
